Message: Koodo: In 10 days your Voicemail service will be updated. You'll need to download any message you want to keep or it will be deleted. The first time you check your Voicemail after the update, you'll need to call from your Koodo phone. Get more info at koodomobile.com/newvoicemail. Thanks for choosing Koodo!

Koodo: In 2 days your Voicemail service will be updated. You'll need to download any message you want to keep or it will be deleted. The first time you check your Voicemail after the update, you'll need to call from your Koodo phone. Get more info at koodomobile.com/newvoicemail. Thanks for choosing Koodo!

Koodo: Your Voicemail update has been completed! Before you can use your updated service, you'll need to first change your Voicemail password. It's easy to do. Go to 'Settings', 'Phone' and then 'Change Voicemail Password'. You should download any message you want to keep or it will be deleted. Visit koodomobile.com/newvoicemail to get more info. Thanks for choosing Koodo!
